name: Street Fighter II
overview: Take the wildest fighting action everywhere you go! Travel the globe seeking the wildest martial arts action with the courageous and elite World Warriors. Get ready to rumble as you choose your champion and prepare to brawl your way through the World Warrior ranks for a chance to put the hurt on M. Bison! With fierce display of bone-crushing moves these global contestants draw; to the very end. Can anyone survive this incredible test of martial arts annihilation? World warrior martial arts action comes to Game Boy!
